about_the_game:
Stranded in a post-apocalyptic sky, SKYLARK places you as a lone survivor determined to uncover the truth of a desolate world. With only your trusty robot companion and a patchwork air balloon ship, you'll chart an endless horizon—gathering resources, rescuing the last animal survivors, and making decisions that shape the course of your journey.

KEY FEATURES

  • Survival & Resource Management: Carefully ration food, fuel, and supplies to keep your air balloon afloat. Fend off the harsh realities of a world on the brink of collapse.

  • Multiple Paths & Endings: Encounter good, bad, and mysterious events that drive branching storylines. Each choice unlocks new possibilities—and new truths.

  • Radio Signals & Discovery: Follow cryptic broadcasts that guide you to distant locations. Learn who—or what—is behind the transmissions, and decide your path forward.

  • Rescue & Rebuild: Seek out animal companions in need of rescue. Expand your airborne sanctuary as you collect and protect the last remnants of life.

  • Start from the Oil Platform: Launch each new game from a deserted oil platform. Revisit these early resources and forge your own unique path every time.

WHAT AWAITS ABOVE THE CLOUDS?

Will you uncover the hidden secrets of this post-apocalyptic sky, or be lost forever among the ruins? Prepare for an emotional voyage through a world reclaimed by nature—and find out what the radio is leading you toward in SKYLARK.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 14 or above
  • Processor: Intel Core™ 2 Duo 2.0+ GHz / Apple M1 or above
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card with 512MB VRAM
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 32-bit RAM - 3 GB, Keyboard and mouse required

name: SKYLARK

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 11 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core™ 2 Duo 2.0+ GHz or an equivalent AMD CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce 8800 GT or AMD Radeon HD2900 XT (with 512MB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Keyboard and mouse required, Microsoft Xbox 360 controller optional

short_description: You arrive with a robot companion on an abandoned oil platform. Scavenge resources, rescue animals, and follow a mysterious radio signal. Every choice shapes your fate. Survive the skies and uncover the truth behind a forgotten world with your air balloon ship with your companions.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Indonesian, Japanese, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
